==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|lit=northern capital}}
{{wikipedia|lang=zh}}

===Etymology===
Chosen by {{w|Yongle Emperor}} to distinguish the city from {{zh-l|南京|[[Nanjing]]}}, the southern of the two capitals of the Ming Dynasty.
